basic.description:
An overview of qualitative methodology and methods frequently used in health care research is provided. Topics include, but are not limited to, action research, ethnography, grounded theory, hermeneutics and phenomenology. Methods include focus groups, interviews and participatory observation. Opportunities may exist for interviewing, participatory observation and data analysis. (Cross listed with NURS-802) 3 hour lecture/seminar: Fall term.
EXCLUSION: NURS-802
basic.subject: RHBS
basic.title: Qualitative Methodology and Methods
